content: Create a comprehensive comparative ethics report that: defines Utilitarianism with its core principle of maximizing happiness and at least two historical proponents; defines Deontology with its core principle of duty-based morality and at least one historical proponent; explains the Trolley Problem thought experiment; and analyzes how strict adherents of each framework would reach different conclusions when facing the Trolley Problem, explicitly stating which ethical approach leads to which action.
